summary: This is an email exchange between Robert Glassman and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys' intention to file a new bail application. It serves as a notification and coordination update from the prosecution to a party involved in the case.

persons.name: Robert Glassman
persons.context: The recipient of an email update from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's bail application.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email; her attorneys intend to file a new bail application.

connections.description: Glassman is being updated by the prosecution about Maxwell's legal proceedings, suggesting he has a professional interest in the case.

events.title: Notification of Planned Bail Application
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office notifies Robert Glassman that Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys intend to file a new bail application.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys planned to file a new bail application as of December 2, 2020.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was proactively notifying interested parties, including attorney Robert Glassman, about this development.
No specific briefing schedule or hearing date for the bail application had been set at the time of this email.
